review: The advantage that this product provides is that it has an additional sound output port (digital optical) which allows me to route sound to  my Sennheiser wireless earphones---(or receiver deck) as I have trouble hearing properly from the TV sound output.  Now, I can experience full benefit from my 'Prime' movies and new releases as well as all of the other 'apps' that it provides.  In combination with a fast WIFI network it streams movies and other programming without  having to buffer data-----no problems to report.
author: Deseret Rider

review: AFTV is a great little android TV box. I love it especially the prime member services on the box from videos to music and apps. I urge Amazon to enable the USB for external storage connection as for now it's useless unless u want to use a wireless keyboard which is not a big deal. In addition I urge Amazon to remove the newly added banners and advertisement for prime members as we have enough advertisement and recommendation on their website and emails .Being an Amazon prime  member for years now and appreciating it ,!the above are my recommendation to Amazon for an ever evolving fun experience with their little box.
author: HISHAM R KAAKI
